titles: Die Mercurii, 20 Julii, 1642. An order of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament that the judges and justices of assize, in the severall counties of England and Wales, in open court, and in their severall charges to be delivered to the grand juries at the next assizes, shall declare and publish, that the said Lords and Commons have resolved upon the question, that His majesties commissions of array are against law, and against the liberty and property of the subject.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscott, and John Wright,
notes: Order to be printed dated and signed: Die Mercurii, 20 Julij, 1642. Io: Browne Cleric. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
